creator: Eutherin
title: Making a planet in gimp
description: This project guides you through creating a planet with a star background using GIMP, a free image editing software.
steps: Create a new file by navigating to File>Create>Misc> Planet Render...
Configure planet settings such as size (e.g., 500 pixels), planet color, outer atmosphere color, sun orientation, and sun tilt, then click OK.
Add a new layer and place it at the bottom of the layer list to serve as the background.
Fill the background layer with black using the bucket tool, then apply filters>noise>hsv noise to generate stars.
Adjust the HSV noise settings (Holdness, Hue, Saturation, Value) to customize the star pattern until satisfied, then click OK.
Save the final image in your preferred file format.
